section.p: The template captures information for the SEND Body Weight Gain domain. It is used to record changes in the body weight of a study subject.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:958)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:959)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:960)
A sequence number used to identify the body weight change observation. [SEND: BGSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:961), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Weight Gain CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:962)
A value to indicate the nature of the observation recording the subject's the subject's change in weight. Use the code property of the CD type to capture the test code, and the original text property to capture a verbatim description of the test. [SEND: BGTESTCD, BGTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:963), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1548)
Used to indicate whether or not a measurement has been performed. [SEND: BGSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:964)
Date/times that the subject was weighed which are captured as a time interval. This should include both the starting and ending points for the measure of weight change. [SEND: BGDTC, BGENDTC]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:965)
The recorded test result. Use up to three observations if needed. Use of standard or non-standard units of measure is indicated by the OID provided for the PQR -physical quantity representation - type supporting physical quantities. Character data is sent using the ED - encapsulated data - type. [SEND: BGORRES, BGORRESU, BGSTRESC, BGSTRESN, BGSTRESU]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:966)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:967)
Information on the reason a scheduled activity was not carried out.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:968)
Information on the reason that a data item is to be excluded from tabulation.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Exclusion Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.38)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:969)
A reference to the study days corresponding to the time period of the observation.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Day Period (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.82)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:970)
Creates an assoication between the timing of an activity and a defined reference time point.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] interpretationCode (CONF:971), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:972)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). Namely, whether the result should be excluded from tabulations. [SEND: BGEXCLFL]

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:973)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:974)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:975)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:958)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:959)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:960)
A sequence number used to identify the body weight change observation. [SEND: BGSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:961), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Weight Gain CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:962)
A value to indicate the nature of the observation recording the subject's the subject's change in weight. Use the code property of the CD type to capture the test code, and the original text property to capture a verbatim description of the test. [SEND: BGTESTCD, BGTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:963), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1548)
Used to indicate whether or not a measurement has been performed. [SEND: BGSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:964)
Date/times that the subject was weighed which are captured as a time interval. This should include both the starting and ending points for the measure of weight change. [SEND: BGDTC, BGENDTC]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:965)
The recorded test result. Use up to three observations if needed. Use of standard or non-standard units of measure is indicated by the OID provided for the PQR -physical quantity representation - type supporting physical quantities. Character data is sent using the ED - encapsulated data - type. [SEND: BGORRES, BGORRESU, BGSTRESC, BGSTRESN, BGSTRESU]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] interpretationCode (CONF:971), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:972)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). Namely, whether the result should be excluded from tabulations. [SEND: BGEXCLFL]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:966)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:967)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Information on the reason a scheduled activity was not carried out.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:968)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Exclusion Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.38)
Information on the reason that a data item is to be excluded from tabulation.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:969)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Day Period (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.82)
A reference to the study days corresponding to the time period of the observation.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:970)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)
Creates an assoication between the timing of an activity and a defined reference time point.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:973)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:974)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:975)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
